attributes.action: Cease to claim sovereignty over Antarctic waters in an attempt to exploit oil and gas there
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK government should respect the spirit and the letter of the Antarctic Treaty and cease all claims to sovereignty over Antarctic waters and its continental shelf, in order to safeguard that continent from exploitation and environmental damage. It should give up all claims to oil and gas reserves there and focus on its stated aims of improved environmental awareness instead, protecting the continent from other countries' attempts at exploitation.
